name: Harbor City Hostage
description:
***DON'T BUY THE SODA! IT'S BUGGED!***

***WARNING IF YOU FIND AN ENEMY JUST STANDING IN THE MIDDLE OF THE SCREEN DOING NOTHING, THROW SOMETHING AT IT, IT SHOULD KILL IT**** Not bosses though, just punch them, lol.

This game is a River City Ransom fan game, I wanted to see if I could do it in RPG Maker MV, did I, I don't know, you be the judge.
